### getAnalysisUsage() {#ad5c42f306bbd7bc25fd8a3922cf7565e}

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the MachineBasicBlock CFG.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/optimizephis-cpp/#l00067">67</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/optimizephis-cpp">OptimizePHIs.cpp</a>.
